name: Aeolus
hints: All you gotta do is not open this bag!

name: Amphinomus
hints: Now that we have armed ourselves, let's make the bastard rot!

name: Anticlea
hints: Even if you're the last thing I see, I'll be waiting

name: Antinous
hints: Where in the hell is our pride and our rage?!

name: Aphrodite
hints: Let him feel the pain that his mother felt and rot

name: Apollo
hints: You all know I'm a fan of catchy songs!

name: Ares
hints: What kind of sick coward holds back his power while his friends get devoured?

name: Athena
hints: Let's teach this dog a lesson in front of all his kind!

name: Calypso
hints: If you hate me, then I am sorry my love's too much for you!

name: Circe
hints: No I'm not a player, I'm a puppeteer!

name: Eurylochus
hints: If you want all the power, you must carry all the blame!

name: Eurymachus
hints: Old king, forgive us instead, so that no more blood is shed!

name: Hephaestus
hints: Trust is not given, it's forged.

name: Hera
hints: So many heroes. So many tales. Give me one good reason why yours should prevail

name: Hermes
hints: Someone who's not afraid to... send a message!

name: Melanthius
hints: We can still defeat the king if we all attack the prince!

name: Odysseus
hints: When does a man become a monster?

name: Penelope
hints: I will fall in love with you over and over again!

name: Polites
hints: This life is amazing when you greet It with open arms!

name: Polyphemus
hints: Don't you know that pain you sow is pain you reap?

name: Scylla
hints: We must do what it takes to survive

name: Telemachus
hints: Maybe to fall is to learn one way!

name: Tiresias
hints: Time, I've unlocked it. I see past and future running free.

name: Zeus
hints: Show her I'm the judgment call
